meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Paul Thomas Anne Kanter Mary Jane Wright Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1343.

td.p: Paul Thomas, a law student from San Francisco, California
Anne Kanter, a homemaker from McLean, Virginia
Mary Jane Wright, an administrator originally from Lima, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,201)

tr.td: "HORSE"PLAY
ANCIENT ROME
THE BEATLES
FOOD FACTS
WEAPONS
IN THE BOOKSTORE
